column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''41''' is the forty-first issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
* "From The Shibboleth of Fëanor" — J.R.R. Tolkien.
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
* "The Fëanorian Tengwar and the Typology of Phonetic Writing Systems" — [[Ivan Derzhanski
* "Transitions in Translations: Proudfoots vs. Proudfeet" (column) — [[Arden R. Smith]].
